title: Incomplete Blacklist
overview: If an incomplete blacklist is used as a security mechanism, then the software may allow unintended values to pass into the application logic.
remediation: ::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY:Input Validation:EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Combine use of blacklist with appropriate use of whitelists.::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY:Input Validation:EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Do not rely exclusively on blacklist validation to detect malicious input or to encode output. There are too many variants to encode a character; you&#x27;re likely to miss some variants.::
